20110102050129.000|20110102050130.000|CC1|ALL SIZES, LIKE IN BRENHAM,     
20110102050130.000|20110102050133.000|CC1|TEXAS.

20110102050134.000|20110102050135.000|CC1|BEEN CHASING FOR MORE THAN A

20110102050137.000|20110102050140.000|CC1|HATE THE MOST, AND WE'RE NEVER

20110102050141.000|20110102050148.000|CC1|SOLVED.

20110102050202.000|20110102050205.000|CC1|11, 2008, WHEN HIS WIFE SANDRA  
20110102050205.000|20110102050206.000|CC1|PICKED UP THEIR DAUGHTER ALEXIA
